languages.text: "Тебе должно видеть это, Домин'{name}". {n}Кибелла склоняется над телом исповедника и клинком отсекает край воротника, обнажая небольшой шрам на шее. Такой же, как у захваченного когда-то в палатах плазмадвигателя нечестивца, только давно зарубцевавшийся.{/n}

"You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тебе должно видеть это, Домин'{name}". {n}Кибелла склоняется над телом исповедника и клинком отсекает край воротника, обнажая небольшой шрам на шее. Такой же, как у захваченного когда-то в палатах плазмадвигателя нечестивца, только давно зарубцевавшийся.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You ought to see this, Enim'{name}". {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and cuts off the edge of his collar with her blade, exposing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the blasphemer in the plasma drive chambers had, except it had healed a long time ago.{/n}

"You ought to see this, Enim'{name}". {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and cuts off the edge of his collar with her blade, exposing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the blasphemer in the plasma drive chambers had, except it had healed a long time ago.{/n}

"You ought to see this, Enim'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the blasphemer in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

"You ought to see this, Enim'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the blasphemer in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

"You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

"You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

languages.text: "Das hier solltet Ihr sehen, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah beugt sich über die Leiche des Konfessors und schlitzt mit ihrer Klinge den Rand seines Kragens auf, um eine winzige Narbe an seinem Nacken freizulegen. Sie gleicht der Narbe des gefangenen Arbeiters in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern, ist aber schon vor langer Zeit verheilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das hier solltet Ihr sehen, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah beugt sich über die Leiche des Konfessors und schlitzt mit ihrer Klinge den Rand seines Kragens auf, um eine winzige Narbe an seinem Nacken freizulegen. Sie gleicht der Narbe des gefangenen Arbeiters in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern, ist aber schon vor langer Zeit verheilt.{/n}

languages.text: «Debería ver esto, Domin'{name}». {n}Kibellah se inclina sobre el cadáver del confesor y le raja el cuello del hábito con el cuchillo, revelando una diminuta cicatriz en su nuca. Es similar a la que tenía el obrero capturado en las cámaras del motor de plasma, salvo que la del confesor hace ya mucho tiempo que sanó.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Debería ver esto, Domin'{name}». {n}Kibellah se inclina sobre el cadáver del confesor y le raja el cuello del hábito con el cuchillo, revelando una diminuta cicatriz en su nuca. Es similar a la que tenía el obrero capturado en las cámaras del motor de plasma, salvo que la del confesor hace ya mucho tiempo que sanó.{/n}

languages.text: 「これを見て、ドミン・{name}」{n}キベラは聴罪師の体の上に身を乗り出すと、襟の端を刃で切り落とし、首の後ろにある小さな傷跡をこちらに見せた。プラズマドライブ室で捕らえられた労働者のものとそっくりだが、この傷は明らかにずっと前に治ったものである。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これを見て、エニム・{name}」{n}キベラは聴罪師の体の上に身を乗り出すと、襟の端を刃で切り落とし、首の後ろにある小さな傷跡をこちらに見せた。プラズマドライブ室で捕らえられた労働者のものとそっくりだが、この傷は明らかにずっと前に治ったものである。{/n}

languages.text: “你应该看看这个，秘者{name}。”{n}绮贝菈朝告解神父的尸体俯下了身子，用匕首割开了他的衣领边缘，露出他脖子后面细微的伤痕。这个伤痕看起来和等离子驱动室里那个工人的伤痕一模一样，只不过神父的伤痕明显是很久以前留下的旧伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你应该看看这个，秘者{name}。”{n}绮贝菈朝告解神父的尸体俯下了身子，用匕首割开了他的衣领边缘，露出他脖子后面细微的伤痕。这个伤痕看起来和等离子驱动室里那个工人的伤痕一模一样，只不过神父的伤痕明显是很久以前留下的旧伤。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous devriez voir ça, Domin'{name}. » {n}Penchée sur le corps du confesseur, Kibellah découpe son col avec sa lame, révélant au passage une minuscule cicatrice, sur sa nuque. Une lésion identique à celle de l'ouvrier capturé dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, à cette différence près que celle-ci s'est refermée depuis longtemps.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez voir ça, Domin'{name}. » {n}Penchée sur le corps du confesseur, Kibellah découpe son col avec sa lame, révélant au passage une minuscule cicatrice, sur sa nuque. Une lésion identique à celle de l'ouvrier capturé dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, à cette différence près que celle-ci s'est refermée depuis longtemps.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunu görmen gerek Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah günah çıkarıcının cesedine eğiliyor ve kılıcıyla yakasının köşesini kesip boynunun arkasındaki küçük bir yara izini açığa çıkarıyor. Tıpkı plazma iticisi odalarında yakalanan işçininkine benziyor. Tek farkı bunun çok uzun zaman önce iyileşmiş olması.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You ought to see this, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah leans over the confessor's body and slices off the edge of his collar with her blade, revealing a tiny scar on the back of his neck. It looks just like the one the captured worker in the plasma drive chambers had, except that this one clearly healed a long time ago.{/n}
